cleaned.title: [TEMP CHECK] Onboard BNBx on Aave V3 BNB Chain
cleaned.author: 0xF1dF824419879Bb8a7E758173523F88EfB7Af193

raw.title: [TEMP CHECK] Onboard BNBx on Aave V3 BNB Chain
raw.author: 0xF1dF824419879Bb8a7E758173523F88EfB7Af193
raw.body:
---

Title: [TEMP CHECK] Onboard BNBx on Aave V3 BNB Chain  
Author: ACI (Aave Chan Initiative)
Date: 2024-03-04

---

## **Summary**

This TEMP CHECK proposes the addition of BNBx from Stader to Aave V3 BNB Chain to enhance LST liquidity and asset diversity.

## **Motivation**

BNBx is a liquid staked token of BNB from Stader. Users can freely mint BNBx in exchange for BNB deposits and earn yield from staking.

The Aave-Chan Initiative supports LST diversity in Aave V3 and looks to add more LST to the new BNB Chain deployment.

## **Specification**

Contract address: [0x1bdd3cf7f79cfb8edbb955f20ad99211551ba275](https://bscscan.com/token/0x1bdd3cf7f79cfb8edbb955f20ad99211551ba275)

Detailed risk parameters will be formulated and shared in the ARFC phase, after positive community feedback from this TEMP CHECK.

**Useful Links**

- Website: https://www.staderlabs.com/
- BNBx docs: https://binance.docs.staderlabs.com/

## Disclaimer

The ACI is not presenting this TEMP CHECK on behalf of any third party and is not compensated for creating this ARFC.

## Next Steps

1. If consensus is reached on this [TEMP CHECK], escalate this proposal to the Snapshot stage.
2. If the Snapshot outcome is YAE, this proposal will be escalated to ARFC stage
3. Publication of a standard ARFC, collect community & service providers feedback before escalating proposal to ARFC snapshot stage
4. If the ARFC snapshot outcome is YAE, publish an AIP vote for final confirmation and enforcement of the proposal

## Copyright

Copyright and related rights waived via [CC0](https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/).

raw.body:
---

Title: [TEMP CHECK] Onboard wbETH on Aave V3 BNB Chain 
Author: ACI (Aave Chan Initiative)
Date: 2024-03-05

---

## **Summary**

This TEMP CHECK proposes the addition of wbETH the Binance Liquid Staked ETH Token to Aave V3 BNB Chain to enhance LST liquidity and asset diversity.

## **Motivation**

Liquid Staked Tokens are one of the premier collateral types on Aave and drive most of the ETH borrow demand. wBETH is one of the largest Liquid Staking Tokens on the market and one of the more productive assets available on BNB Chain.  

The Aave-Chan Initiative supports LST diversity in Aave V3 and looks to add more LST to the new BNB Chain deployment.

## **Specification**

Contract: [0xa2E3356610840701BDf5611a53974510Ae27E2e1](https://bscscan.com/token/0xa2E3356610840701BDf5611a53974510Ae27E2e1)

Detailed risk parameters will be formulated and shared in the ARFC phase, after positive community feedback from this TEMP CHECK.

**Useful links:** 
- Website: https://www.binance.com/en/ethereum-staking

## Disclaimer

The ACI is not presenting this TEMP CHECK on behalf of any third party and is not compensated for creating this ARFC.

## Next Steps

1. If consensus is reached on this [TEMP CHECK], escalate this proposal to the Snapshot stage.
2. If the Snapshot outcome is YAE, this proposal will be escalated to ARFC stage
3. Publication of a standard ARFC, collect community & service providers feedback before escalating proposal to ARFC snapshot stage
4. If the ARFC snapshot outcome is YAE, publish an AIP vote for final confirmation and enforcement of the proposal

## Copyright

Copyright and related rights waived via [CC0](https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/).

cleaned.title: [TEMP CHECK]  Onboard ezETH to Aave V3 Ethereum
cleaned.author: 0xF1dF824419879Bb8a7E758173523F88EfB7Af193

raw.title: [TEMP CHECK]  Onboard ezETH to Aave V3 Ethereum
raw.author: 0xF1dF824419879Bb8a7E758173523F88EfB7Af193
raw.body:
---
### **[TEMP CHECK] Onboard ezETH to Aave V3 Ethereum**

### **Author: Renzo Protocol & ACI (Aave Chan Initiative)**

### **Date: 2024-03-28**

---

## **Summary**

This is a TEMP CHECK to gauge community sentiment for adding borrow/lend support for Renzo Protocol and its Liquid Restaking Token (LRT) ezETH on AAVE V3 Ethereum.

## **Motivation**

The motivation for this proposal is to introduce a new asset class LRT (Liquid restaking tokens) to Aave and add to the diversity of LST/ LRT category.

Liquid Restaking tokens (LRTs) have proven to be very popular lately and can be great collateral assets on Aave. As productive assets, staking tokens are high quality collateral to borrow against.

Given their high correlation to ETH, LRTs are commonly used as collateral to borrow ETH and engage in yield leveraged staking, with several communities having built products that automate such strategies on top of Aave. The introduction of eMode only made such strategies more popular.

The onboarding of ezETH will consequently create increased ezETH demand and increased revenues for both Aave and Renzo Protocol, whilst also bolstering the liquidity and peg stability of ezETH.

## **Chain to be deployed/listed**

Ethereum mainnet.

## **Relevant KPI & Points Rewards**

Renzo awards ezPoints and EigenLayer Restaked Points based on usersâ€™ ezETH holdings. Every user that deposits ezETH as collateral in Aave will also be awarded ezPoints and EigenLayer points 1:1.

As relevant KPI for the Protocol:

- Total Value Locked: $1.9 billion

- Total supply: 526K+ Renzo Restaked ETH

- 24H trading volume: $80,203,780

## **Useful Links**

[Renzo Protocol](https://www.renzoprotocol.com/)

[Documentation](https://docs.renzoprotocol.com/docs)

[Github](https://github.com/Renzo-Protocol)

[Audits](https://github.com/Renzo-Protocol/contracts-public/blob/master/Audit/Renzo_Protocol_EVM_Contracts_Smart_Contract_Security_Assessment.pdf)

[Chainlink Data Feed](https://data.chain.link/feeds/ethereum/mainnet/ezeth-eth)

[Composable Stable Pool](https://app.balancer.fi/#/ethereum/pool/0x596192bb6e41802428ac943d2f1476c1af25cc0e000000000000000000000659)

## **Disclaimer**

The Aave-chan Initiative is not presenting this TEMP CHECK on behalf of any third party and is not compensated by Renzo Protocol for creating this proposal.

## **Next Steps**

1. If consensus is reached on this [TEMP CHECK], escalate this proposal to the Snapshot stage.
2. If the Snapshot outcome is YAE, this proposal will be escalated to ARFC stage
3. Publication of a standard ARFC, collect community & service providers feedback before escalating proposal to ARFC snapshot stage
4. If the ARFC snapshot outcome is YAE, publish an AIP vote for final confirmation and enforcement of the proposal

## **Copyright**

Copyright and related rights waived under [CC0](https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/).

cleaned.title: [ARFC] Onboard sUSDe to Aave V3 on Ethereum
cleaned.author: 0xF1dF824419879Bb8a7E758173523F88EfB7Af193

raw.title: [ARFC] Onboard sUSDe to Aave V3 on Ethereum
raw.author: 0xF1dF824419879Bb8a7E758173523F88EfB7Af193
raw.body:
---
### [ARFC]  Onboard sUSDe to Aave V3 on Ethereum 

### Author:  ACI (Aave Chan Initiative)

### Date: 2024-04-01

---

### **Summary**

This is an ARFC to seek approval for the addition of sUSDe to Aave V3 on Ethereum, following the consensus reached in the [TEMP CHECK](https://snapshot.org/#/aave.eth/proposal/0x3263dbee34f5afe513a1a6c5bcd5207684cee03473e1b3d7616993dbd87ab881) stage.

### **Motivation**

As discussed in the TEMP CHECK, Ethena's synthetic dollar, USDe, provides a stable crypto-native solution for a cash and carry structured product. The staked version of USDe, sUSDe, earns yield from the protocol and has high potential for strong borrow demand. 

### **Specification**

sUSDe: [0x9d39a5de30e57443bff2a8307a4256c8797a3497](https://etherscan.io/token/0x9d39a5de30e57443bff2a8307a4256c8797a3497)

### Risk Parameters

Risk parameters have been provided by Chaos Labs in the ARFC discussion thread. 

Initial Risk Parameters are the following:

| Parameter | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Isolation Mode | Yes |
| Borrowable | No |
| Collateral Enabled | Yes |
| Supply Cap (sUSDe) | 85M |
| Debt Ceiling |40M |
| LTV | 72.00% |
| LT | 75.00% |
| Liquidation Bonus | 8.50% |
| Liquidation Protocol Fee | 10.00%|
|Flashloanable|No|
|Siloed Borrowing|No|
|Borrowed in Isolation|No|
|Emode|No|

### **Useful Links**

[TEMP CHECK](https://governance.aave.com/t/temp-check-onboard-susde-to-aave-v3-on-ethereum/16840)
[TEMP CHECK Snapshot](https://snapshot.org/#/aave.eth/proposal/0x3263dbee34f5afe513a1a6c5bcd5207684cee03473e1b3d7616993dbd87ab881)

### Disclaimer

This proposal is powered by Skywards. The Aave Chan Initiative is not directly affiliated with Ethena and did not receive compensation for creation this proposal.

### **Next Steps**

1. Collect community & service providers feedback on this ARFC.
2. Escalate the proposal to ARFC snapshot stage if feedback is positive.
3. If the ARFC snapshot outcome is YAE, publish an AIP vote for final confirmation and enforcement of the proposal.

### Copyright

Copyright and related rights waived under [CC0](https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/)

decision.summary: The proposal to onboard slisBNB to Aave V3 BNB chain is strongly supported by voting timeline metrics, with unanimous lead and stability for YAE. Forum discussion is limited but generally neutral, with one post after voting showing negativity. Historical similar proposals also favored YAE and resulted in positive TVL impact despite minor price dips. Market impact shows a positive price and TVL increase post-vote. Thus, the recommendation is to change by approving the proposal.
key_arguments_for: Strong timeline voting metrics with 100% lead and stability for YAE
Onboarding slisBNB enhances LST liquidity and asset diversity
Lista DAO offers liquidity incentives to bootstrap the market
Similar past proposals passed with positive TVL impact
key_arguments_against: Minor negative sentiment in forum post after vote end
Potential risks of new asset integration not fully detailed

evidence.quote: Forum comments are mostly neutral with one negative post after voting ended.
Timeline metrics show 100% lead ratio and stability for YAE option.

decision.ai_final_conclusion: Option 'YAE' selected with stance to keep 'Change'.
decision.ai_final_reason:
- Voting timeline metrics show unanimous and stable lead for YAE throughout the proposal period.
- Forum sentiment is mostly neutral with no strong opposition, aligning with the recommended choice.
- Similar historical proposals favored YAE and resulted in positive TVL impacts, supporting the change stance.
- Market impacts post-vote are positive in both token price and TVL, indicating community acceptance and value addition.
